statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 2 , 7 \, x^{3} - 15 \, x^{2} - 22 \, x + 4 , -5 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 2 , 2 \, x^{2} + x + 1 , -4 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
